name: Underwater Bubble Balloon Rise Up Protector
name_original: Underwater Bubble Balloon Rise Up Protector
description:
Project is a fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Move your shield and protect bubble balloon while it's rising up. Don't hit the obstacles. Once obstacle hits the bubble game is over. Try to score as much as you can. Game is endless and becomes harder and harder as it progress.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
This is complete project pack and it is ready for release.
Mobile ready. Easy to reskin.
